author: jlidrych
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is related to this [issue](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/error-in-hiexpress-harvesting-for-run-374595/30125/8).
The proposed changes should be harmless - only unnecessary re-binning is removed.

#### PR validation:

It compiles. I tried ```runTheMatrix.py -l limited --useInput all --ibeos``` and it passed.
title: Removing re-binnning from SiStripBadAPVandHotStripAlgorithm
